synopsis.text: Glory is an immensely popular MMORPG in China that has grown into a major esport, with professional leagues and tournaments now being organized. The story follows two friends, Ye Qiu and Su Muqiu, who aspire to become professional Glory players. Two years ago, the first professional Glory league in China was announced, culminating in the Glory Championship tournament. However, due to personal reasons, Ye Qiu had been hesitant to seriously pursue the national stage until now. Finally, Ye Qiu and Su Muqiu agree to form their own team called Team Excellent Era, named after the internet cafe run by their boss and sponsor Tao Xuan. With strong determination, Team Excellent Era sets out to defeat all opponents on their journey to reach the pinnacle of Glory esports. They face many challenges from other professional teams and players who stand in the way of their dream. Despite the difficulties, the story follows the friends as they give their all in hopes of one day becoming Glory champions.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
